Welcome to 365 Days of jQuery.

A personal project to help myself and hopefully others have a better understanding of jQuery and create some cool stuff.

If you see anything that could be improved or would like to contribute, please report an issue or better still send a pull request. Screencast coming soon.

Follow @365daysofjquery
